title: What is this typeface?
content:
I’m making a manual for a computer game called Portal and I’m using images from the trailer for the game to keep it as authentic as possible.

I have a problem though. I’m using the intro image from the trailer

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907002900im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/cover_5468.jpg)
 and am changing the word “video” to the word “Manual”
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907002900im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/01-cover-sm_4894.jpg)
The problem is that I can’t seem to get the typeface right and I’m having a hard time finding out what the original typeface it.

I don’t work for valve, but I do have permission to make this manual and use their images. Beyond that I am on my own. Can someone help me get this typeface right because this is really bugging me.

 [‹ looking for a font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907002900/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45170 "Go to previous forum topic") [Hopefully this should be easy. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907002900/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45163 "Go to next forum topic")
author: markevens

comments.content: I don’t know the typeface, but I wanted to say that Portal is one of the best games I have played in quite some time. :)
